channel.title: UITableViewCell on Roger Molas - iOS Tricks and Findings
channel.description: Recent content in UITableViewCell on Roger Molas - iOS Tricks and Findings

item.title: Access class name using @objc attribute
item.author: contact@rogermolas.com (Roger Molas)
item.description: Scenario Create a Simple Table View app Load customs cells each row Cell identifier is the class name if the object is TableCell cell identifier is “TableCell” Use common cell loading techniques Use helper method to load cell using @objc attribute Create UITableViewCell subclass class HeaderCell: UITableViewCell { ... } class ContentsCell: UITableViewCell { ... } class AboutCell: UITableViewCell { ... } Load cell in Tableview in traditional way
